original_text: He should have fed them also with the finest of the wheat: and with honey out of the rock should I have satisfied thee.
korean_text: 또 내가 기름진 밀을 그들에게 먹이며 반석에서 나오는 꿀로 너를 만족하게 하리라 하셨도다

sentences.original_text: He should have fed them also
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들에게 또한 먹이를 주었어야 했는데

sentences.original_text: with the finest of the wheat
and with honey out of the rock
